name: TheyWereUs
description:
A Remake  Of TheyWereUs.

 TheyWereUs is an Action / Horror game where you play in an abstract world.

Fight through maze-like dungeons and strange neighborhoods.

 Use stealth or try your combat skill with easy-to-understand combat mechanics.

CONTROLS:

" WASD  " To Move;

" E " To Interact;

" Mouse Click " To Move Sword;

Credits:

Frances Silva G:

-Gameplay Programing.

Frances Silva A:
